channel.title: Pi tele spell

item.title: Pi tele spell
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("helpme")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2795, 3321, 0, "modern"); for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage(c.playerName + " has just teleported to the help area."); } } }

item.description:
